headline.main: ONE KILLED, 9 HURT IN RIOTING IN PARIS; Women Take Leading Part as Male Aides Fight Police -- Nazi Soldier Is Wounded ONE KILLED, 9 HURT IN RIOTING IN PARIS

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Aug. 2 -- A woman clambered atop a table on the Avenue d'Orleans in Paris yesterday, screamed "riot -- the Americans demand it," and touched off a melee of gunfire and slugging in which one person was killed and nine were injured gravely, the government announced tonight.
abstract: 1 killed, 9 hurt in riot, Av d'Orleans, Paris; wounded police decorated by Laval; freight-passenger train crash reptd, Nancy; potato riot reptd, Somme
